about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Sunrise by the ocean on an island is how you will begin this immersion. Experience the waves nearing your feet while the sun begins to light up the landscape around you before going to the base of a very large waterfall overlook. End this relaxing journey miles away from civilized happenings in a forest moving into the fall time.

Purpose
Relaxation
Mindfulness
Self meditation

Length
10:19

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
